author: Lauraine Genota
title: D.C. to keep schools closed until May 15
description: Mayor Bowser's previous order closed schools through at least April 24.
content:
District of Columbia Mayor Muriel Bowser. | Jacquelyn Martin/AP Photo
Mayor Muriel Bowser announced Wednesday the extension of the public health emergency in Washington, D.C., for another month, prolonging a school shutdown.
